item.title: How to use Lightbi theme ?
item.description: In this post, we’ll cover how to install Hugo and set up your first website with the Lightbi theme. For detailed steps, refer to Hugoâ€™s quick-start guide. Create a New Hugo Site hugo new site <name of site> cd <name of site> git init git submodule add https://github.com/binokochumolvarghese/lightbi-hugo themes/lightbi-hugo After completing the steps above, copy the contents of exampleSite/contents into the content folder of your website. Next, copy hugo.toml to the root folder of the website.

item.title: Parameters in Lightbi
item.description: Below is a list of configurable parameters in the Lightbi theme, along with descriptions to help you customize your site effectively. You can be adjust the below parameters in your hugo.toml file. Theme Parameters readingTime Type: Boolean (true or false) Description: When set to true, displays an estimated reading time for each post. This helps readers gauge how long it will take to read the content. wordCount Type: Boolean Description: Enables or disables the word count display for each post.
